reviews.review: Увидеть Portal 2 от заставки до замечательного финала должен всякий, кто любит ироничные тексты и чья голова не набита опилками. GLaDOS  мы идем!

Portals, & portals. You just have to think portals, if not you will fail. It's one of those games which you look back at and think... "This game was amazing, why am I not playing it?". So, why aren't you playing it?

I played Portal 2 a year back, then I just loved it for a couple of months... but a couple of months ago there came a new free DLC where you can create your own stuff! That made me want to play the game again, and yeah... I am really recommending this game to everyone.

But remeber, think with portals!
Para quem gosta de racicinio e bom jogar esse jogo.
If you don't have this game I would be very surprised. Totally worth the money before the map creator. Now you could play for ever and ever so you will get your money's worth.
PORTAL!
muhteşem.

Une suite vraiment sympathique, servie par une bonne réalisation et une excellente narration. Les nouveautés de gameplay ajoute du piment aux puzzles et donne parfois du fil à retordre. Excellent mode Coop à la bonne durée de vie.
This game kept me involved all the way to the end. Very few games do that. It's gorgeous and the storyline is solid. Hopefully a Portal 3 is in the works soon.
Portal 2. Game of the Year 2011. 'Nuff said.
£3.74 - bargain
Buy it. NOW.
Intelligence and perspective are your weapons in this game (a little bit of patience too xD) one of the best games of the decade and one of the best ever made!
While missing the "wow" effect it's predecessor had, Portal 2 is a masterfully sculpted pile of fun. Larger, funnier and more immersive, it simply doesn't disappoint
Even better the 2nd time through
Portals
Dude, wormholes and shit.
Great game! Outdoes the original and makes you feel smarter as you play. Don't be a pussy and cheat for the solutions just think really hard.
You didn't buy it yet? You monster.
This game is a pure embodiment of Valve, complete with great level design, amazing visuals and a brilliant story. 9/10.

Leuk spel!

Het verhaal is zeer goed en volgt wel goed op het verhaal van Portal 1.
Je moet Portal 1 echt niet gespeeld te hebben om het verhaal te begrijpen.
Ik heb zelf eerst Portal 2 gespeeld en dan pas Portal 1, dus het is perfect mogelijk!
De co-op (campaign) is ook zeer goed gemaakt met opnieuw zeer leuke puzzles die heel uniek zijn ten opzichte van de puzzles in de campaign. Bij veel puzzles moet je echt goed samenwerken en nadenken , dat maakt juist de co-op zeer speciaal.
Uiteindelijk kan je nog DUIZENDEN mappen (puzzles) spelen door ze van de Steam Workshop te downloaden voor beide singleplayer en co-op! Dit systeem werkt zeer goed en kan ervoor zorgen dat je direct met een druk op de knop in een andere puzzle belandt en verder alleen of met je vriend verder kan spelen.

Ik vind het een ontzettend goed spel met eindeloos plezier!
Ik raad het zeker aan, zelfs nu nog steeds! Een dikverdiende 10 op 10 zou ik het geven.
Zeker 1 van de beste ,in perfectie gemaakte, game die ik ooit heb gespeeld.

Voor de doorzetters kan je de campaign en co-op altijd nog speedrunnen en hierdoor een goede tijd neerzetten op de ranglijsten! :)

Portal 2 est simplement le Graal du jeu vidéo.
Un jeu linéaire n'est pas forcement un defaut et Portal nous le prouve. Si vous aimez les jeux "d'Aventure" ou les "Puzzle Games" il est pour vous. C'est simplement le meilleur !

Il y a tout pour faire un bon jeu :

-Une bonne durée de vie.
-Une aventure unique et surprenante.
-Des dialogues épatants, humour noir et phrase culte.
-Une difficulté très bien dosée.
-Une fin epic.
-Un mode Coopération.
-Compatible Steam Wrokshop

C'est surement l'un des meilleurs jeux vidéo auxquels j'ai joué. Bravo Valve.
Cooooool Game Take it

Muy buen juego.

Es un juego que divierte y es inovador y llamativo, de hecho a mi no me gustan mucho los juegos de puzzles, pero jugé a Portal 2 y esto es una maravilla. No solo te hace pensar, sino que disfrutas de una trama mientras haces puzzles y recorreros los mapeados de las camaras de pruebas.

Y lo mejor de todo, con el apoyo de Valve a la comunidad permitiendo el uso de un potente editor (mods) ahora tenemos mapas para años. 

Grande Valve.
Pretty Easy overall but alot of user generated content

Pokračování skvělé logické hry Portal vám tentokrát nabídne mnohem delší a zábavnější příběh, nové prvky, skvělý dabing, dynamickou hudbu, pěknou grafiku, a hlavně úžasný kooperativní režim. S vestavěným editorem navíc lze snadno vytvářet a sdílet mapy s komunitou, a tak se o po dohrátí příběhové linie hry nikdy nezačnete nudit, protože budete neustále zásobeni novými testovacími místnostmi od samotných hráčů.
Quién no se compre este juego estando a 4€ es para matarlo. ¡JUEGAZO!
Mit sehr viel Liebe gemachtes Spiel mit dem man sich stundenlang beschäftigen kann
I Recomend this cos its a cool game, also you think in a different way and if you play portal before this is your game! Not to mention the coop mode it has ;)
Portal 2 is AWESOME. Buy it, ecpecially if it's onl sale! It's well worth the money and with community levels, it has endless replay value.
A highly recommended game, both for single player and co-op. tired of thinking with portals alone? Bring a friend and think with portals togheter....
Маст хэв!
Portal + Coop = WIN
Play it.
lolllllll

The humor, action and the puzzles in this game, along with new game mechanics and a prolonged single player campaign, make it a worth while successor of the first installment of the series. The inclusion of coop game play is great, although I haven't tried it.
Kurzweilig aber goil^^
Pleins de bonnes idées, certaines énigmes sont un peu casse-tête. La coop = fous rires assurés ! xD
La meilleure écriture jamais vue dans un jeu d'humour. (si) Ah, et le jeu est sympa en plus.

Ce jeu il est bien, y'a une histoire franchement captivante, y'a une vraie partie solo qu'on ne peut pas lacher une fois entammée, et une vraie partie coopération qui enchaine agréablement sur le scénario.
Also, summer steam badge.
Lets save science!

Офигенная и захвватывающая все внимание и время игра, не менее и даже, возможно, более местами интересная, чем первая часть) Рекомендую всем, кто хочет немного подумать, затянуться в игру полностью и просто непринужденно провести время :)
Aside from the creative and challenging gameplay, along with the hilarious dialogue, another thing that makes this game great is the newly added ability to download community-created puzzles.
Achetez ce jeu pour les soldes de l'été ! indispensable :D
Very good game! :) Each person who like to think more in games should really check this one out. Also the Co-op is amazing.

Portal 2 - шедевр! Portal 2 уникален. Разработчики сделали ставку на непопулярный жанр, на необычную игровую механику, на то, что людям все еще интересны интеллектуальные забавы, и они могут воспринимать тонкий юмор.
Portal. Portal-Portal-Portal. NOW YOU are thinking with portals! You've never experienced such game before (well, excluding the first Portal). And now? MULTI-F*CKING-PLAYER! Just play it :3
Buy it! You won't regret it.
Это же сиквел который лучше оригинала!

Really high quality game. Nice story, nice puzzles, nice graphics and a nice coop mode.

One thing though, and that's the nature of a puzzle game, is the replayability can be limited. However, Portal 2 have the perfect solution via a puzzle maker and workshop support. The content for the game becomes near infinite!
イロイロ度肝抜かれる作品です。前作プレイした方が面白さが増します。
Ahora que esta de oferta a que esperas para cojertelo?? Yo cojí esta oferta hace mucho tiempo y no me arrepiento de ello ni un solo segundo. Juegazo!! :D
Potato!
Einfach Super!
eines der besten spiele hier
If you liked the first one you owe it to yourself to play this one
Una obra maestra de los videojuegos, un autentico imprescindible, 10/10.

An excellent follow-up to the first game, Portal 2 adds more story, more game mechanics and co-op (which I admittedly haven't tried yet) to make for a very fun time. Cannot recommend this game enough!
Игруха супер- тонкий юмор, харизматические персонажи, головоломки, улётный сюжет, рекомендую!
Лучшая разминка для мозга :)
Превосходное продолжение  серии , к тому же с кооперативом!

Очень интересный мультиплеер, Чесно говоря, не ожодал )
Блядь, всем советую
Una gran secuela y el mejor juego de 2011.

このゲームをやってからポテトを食べられなくなりました！

ギミックやキャラクターが増え、正統進化したPortal。
ただ、1と比べてTest Chamber内でということが減ったり、Chamber内でも植物に侵食されてたりで１の無機質さが減っているのがちょっと残念。
後coopモードもストーリーが面白かったけれど一緒に演る人を探すのが少し難儀かもしれない。
その点を除けばPortal1と同じくらい評価できるゲーム。

１をやって良かったと思うならば素直に買い。
１をやってなかったら思い切ってPortal Bundleを買ってやるべきだ
Ce Jeux est Genial !
Un juego inteligente y bien hecho. Para mí, una obra maestra.

A sequal to a game that did'nt need one but still came out to be a great game.

While the puzzles are slightly easier in this game compared to portal one, its forgivien with the great story/atmosphere/characters of the game.

CO-OP is a nicr addition to, I was able to play through it 3 times and the hardlevels enough to where I still got stuck (bad memory)

The new Map Maker was a much needed addition to replayability to this game
Like the empirical loaf of bread, this comes back to haunt you no matter how many times you try to sunglasses on Michael Caine.
Krótko mówiąc, genialna! Po oddaniu w ręce społeczności narzędzia do tworzenia poziomów-  zabawie nie ma końca!
"I think we can put our differences behind us... for science... you monster."
Portal 2 is a first person puzzle platform nuff said
Everyone should play this!
Rechido, tonto el que no lo tenga.

A fun experience for everyone to enjoy. Innovative, easy and relaxing.
Try making a harder map with the new community maps DLC >:)
The best puzzle game i have ever played.
AWW <3
Great game!
Welcome to the Appeture Science Emergency Surprise System. Deploying Obvious Surprise in 3....2...1..... This game is a masterpiece.
One of the best games I've ever played.
接近完美.

Some games are not about shooting and killing. And if you're looking for some brain exercises with a lot of fun, play Portal 2 (Portal 1 too)! Remember, it's even funnier to play with friend, so don't forget about second copy!
Ce jeu est génial mais déconseillé pour persone ayant des problèmes célébrales empechant toute reusite des salle de test =)
Просто берите и играйте! Не пожалеете! :-)
포탈2를 위해 스팀계정을 만들었다 해도 과언이 아니다
Best puzzle game ever
Amazing.

Chell is back, GlaDOS is back, and the aperture's science portal gun is back. Portal 2 is the sequel of the original portal, but unlike it's predecessor, it's bigger, funnier, better, harder and more immersing. New characters like Wheatley and Cave Johnson help make a new portal experience, and also help explain the backstory and origin of aperture science. The multiplayer is also a wonderful addition, giving new levels for anyone who wants to have some team fun.
You really need me to say anything? Just get the game!

Great game, single player is long, co-op adds in even more replayablity. Just a few problems though, do not play if you have motion sickness or have an upset stomach, you will more than likely throw up
Portal and Portal 2 are great games with great characters. 10/10 would definitely recommend.
Good but short. Puzzles make you think but are not amazingly tough, makes you feel good about yourself when you solve them. Great voice acting.
An even better sequel, with new gimmicks that makes puzzles more intersting, and a very well developed plot. The co-op campaign is also great.
one of my favourite puzzle games

Ceci est une révolution, il faut tout racheter
...heu attendez. C'est pas CoD !!!
Bon blague  vaseuse à par, ce jeu et tout juste génial en plus avec l'éditeur de niveaux qui est fourni avec, Portal 2 est juste le jeu que tout le monde doit posseder. En plus, il parle de fruits et de légumes dedans!

２も文句無く面白い
１も面白いけど２は間違いなくその上を行ったと思う
Metascoreを信用していい一本
何故このゲームがさっさと値下げされた理由が分からない

それぐらいシングルは前作の２倍以上のボリュームがあるし
仕掛けも雰囲気も前作を完全に過去の作品させる名作

前作の謎等、伏線回収はしっかりしているので１からのプレイをおすすめします
It's portal what's not to love?

Awesome game...Wish I had started playing it a year ago. Beyond the improved graphics and story, the puzzles in the single player campaign are more challenging and engrossing. No other game offers up as original of a concept.
不错的游戏
it amazing

Great game, fun story. On the other hand, dated graphics engine with long loadings after every small area. Also very low replay value. Anyway I would recommend this to anyone, because game mechaniques are unique.
Das ist ganz toll ja?!
